</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 274 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 10 gp

**AC Bonus** 2 (+4<sup>2</sup>)

**Speed Penalty** -5 ft.
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 4

**Hardness** 5

**HP (BT)** 20 (10)
</row>

---

These massive shields can be used to provide cover to nearly the entire body. Due to their size, they are typically made of wood reinforced with metal.

 <sup>2</sup> Getting the higher bonus for a tower shield requires using the [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) action while the shield is raised.

[Arctic Worm Chitin Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3199)
